product information:
Play an exhilarating fast-moving game on the ViewSonic Graphic VG2021m monitor that features ClearMotiv 8ms video response time. The integrated stereo speakers of this ViewSonic 20-inch TFT monitor not only save you desk space, but also give you rich stereo sound that takes the entertainment level up a notch. Get an expanded connectivity with the OptiSync digital and analog signals of this ViewSonic LCD monitor. The 280-nit brightness as well as 700:1 contrast ratio of the ViewSonic Graphic VG2021m gives you vibrantly bright and sharp images. This EnergyStar compliant ViewSonic 20-inch TFT monitor saves you energy as well as money. This ViewSonic LCD monitor is VESA certified and can be safely mounted on the wall.
